title: Long Story Short
description: Teddy wakes up the morning after his wedding to discover that he's jumped forward a year in his life to his first anniversary. Trapped in an endless cycle of time jumps, transported another year ahead every few minutes, he is faced with a race against time as his life crumbles around him.

reviews.text: This is a bit of a Groundhog Day type film, although its not exactly that but it has the romance element of it and the time moving element, of course. Its cheesy and sentimental but I thought it was surprisingly good. The characters are likeable enough and there was a nice mix of touching moments and amusing moments. Its an easy watch, its not a complicated film and I didn't think it was too over the top. I think it worked well as Rafe Spall plays such a bewildered character (Teddy). It's hard not to feel sorry for him, trying to figure out what's going on. Its a fun watch, with perhaps one or two serious messages behind it. Yes, I'd recommend this film.
